TopicTitle: How do I rebind the "Debug Toolbar" keybind

Articles.Content:
By default, Alt + F12 opens the Debug Toolbar on my Win-7 x64 Steam installation of KSP.

It is unfortunately also my Steam Screenshot keybind.

I cannot find this keybind in Settings/Controls. I assume there is a config file in which I can change the keybind manually but I don't know where to find it.

Please help me change the keybind to something different, maybe Ctrl+Shift+F11, because I don't use the Debug Toolbar at all and would like to remove the current keybind.

you don't need to launch ksp by steam at all(eh, except play time counting). KSP dosn't have any DRM at all.

run KSP_x64.exe in C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\ or anywhere you installed ksp.

Aight, nice to know.

Still, I'd like to run it via Steam as long as Steam isn't locking me out again. If only for the screenshot uploader and the notifications. Is it possible somehow to move the Debug Toolbar keybind to something else than Alt+F12?

This used to annoy me aswell. Not sure thats possible to change in key binding settings(havent checked), ksp usually uses F1 for screenshots, i ended up not using steam screenshot and used F1 and uploaded pics to imgur / steam etc.

not a solution i know, but hey
